frontmatter.description: This article is for people who are new to web development, lost in the myriad of web frameworks and are asking themselves: What are the real differences in the frameworks?
frontmatter.title: 4 Major Architectural Approaches to Building Websites in 2021

frontmatter.description: I've had to dabble in a bit of web development over the past year as part of my research fellowship and having not done this for a while, I have accrued a couple of thoughts I want to share...
frontmatter.title: The State of Modern Web Development
